archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0719
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when there are offers relevent to me, I want to receive notifications about them, so that I don't have to spend time researching the best deals, and my time is used efficiently in optimising my business

properties.value: How to distinguish relevant for business offer? Based on simple rules or recommendation engine?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
